::Skullgrin::

    Skullgrin looked at Beastbox, then sighed.

    "Ya, it'=
s incredibly boring staying here.  We're missing all the action!" Skullgrin=
 pouted.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Jeremiah 
  To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, April 01, 2001 4:46 PM
  Subject: Re: Air and=
 Ground


  "He ha haaaa" Wildrider roars in laughter. He sees the base com=
ing up.
  "Ohhhh, Im gonna beat... you" He tries to taunt, but he comes to =
a dead
  stop. The oil leaking out of him left a wide trail, he was running=
 on
  empty.

  Speedbreaker pulls up behind him. "Wildrider, you oaf, you =
really should
  keep better care of yourself". "Shudap" Wildrider snaps. Sp=
eebreaker
  tranforms, and wheels him the rest of the way to base. He then =
walks in,
  and goes for a cube.


  Beastbox walks up to Skullgrin, "This =
sucks, Why do we have to stay here?".
  He looks back at the prisoners.
